function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spectrum bias perpetuates the inability to distinguish COVID-19 from illnesses with similar presentations.","Impact":"Increase in misdiagnosis and delay in treatment for contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement data augmentation techniques to counteract the spectrum bias.","Technologies":"Data augmentation algorithms, machine learning models.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients with contagious diseases.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data scientists."},{"Description":"Small sample sizes increase the effect of overfitting in validation methods.","Impact":"Inaccurate performance evaluation of wearable technology for contagious disease detection.","Mitigation":"Use external validation methods and increase sample sizes for more accurate performance assessment.","Technologies":"External validation techniques, data augmentation, big data analytics.","People":"Healthcare researchers, data scientists.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations."},{"Description":"ADM performance may be overoptimistic due to overfitting and lack of generalizability.","Impact":"False reassurance to infectious individuals and poor performance in real-world settings.","Mitigation":"Implement external validation and focus on device-agnostic ADMs for better generalizability.","Technologies":"External validation techniques, machine learning algorithms.","People":"Healthcare professionals, infectious individuals.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data scientists."}]}
